p: On MCF-7 cell line, the tested hybrids showed an IC 50 range of 2.27–37.04 µM, with compounds 5d-f, 7 b and 7 h showing potent cytotoxic effect (3.41, 3.45, 2.27, 2.64 and 4.32 µM, respectively) compared to the reference staurosporine which showed an IC 50 of 4.81 µM. Compounds 5a, 7d, 7e and 13 b showed moderate cytotoxic activity with IC 50 of 5.47, 7.48, 8.33 and 5.70, respectively, whereas, the rest of compounds showed weak cytotoxic activity with IC 50 higher than 10 µM ( Table 1).
